text: The Minister regards the recent trend of recruiting figures as encouraging. He is confident the aim can be achieved. While the possibility of an eventual return to National Service in some form cannot be entirely discounted, he does not agree that the point has been reached where this need even be considered. If National Service is ever resorted to, engagement would probably have to be for three years.
